example[0]: Suddenly, there was a tremendous bang, and the whole station shook.
example[1]: She was making a tremendous effort to appear calm.
example[2]: She praised her husband for the tremendous support he had given her.
example[3]: Sales have been tremendous so far this year.
example[4]: This plan could save us a tremendous amount of money.
example[5]: She’s got a tremendous voice, hasn’t she?
